text: The Sussex Spaniel is a breed of gundog of the spaniel type that was first bred in Sussex in southern England in about the year 1795. It is has shorter legs and is slower than most of the other spaniels. ==Colour== The Sussex Spaniel will always be a dark golden brown colour that in dogs is called Liver. ==Temperament== These dogs are usually very gentle but can be rough with young children. Sometimes they might not like meeting other dogs that they do not know. ==Energy== They are not as fast as most of the other spaniels and do not need to be exercised as much as their cousins. ==References== Category:Spaniels Category:FCI breeds Category:Dog breeds originating in England Category:Rare dog breeds
title: Sussex Spaniel
